H0.text: The Greek god of marriage is. Aphrodite

H1.text: The Greek god of marriage is. Eros

H2.text: The Greek god of marriage is. Hera

H3.text: The Greek god of marriage is. Hymen

A4.text: Hera is the goddess of marriage, women, and family, and the protector of women during childbirth.

A5.text: Hera emerged from a form of the 'Mycenean goddess of the palace' and became the spouse of Zeus.
